attributes.action: commission a momument to Sir Harry Paget Flashman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a memorial to George MacDonald Fraser (GMF), OBE who died in January 2008 a monument should be commissioned of his fictional creation Brigadier-General Sir Harry Paget Flashman VC KCB KCIE (1822 - 1915)one of the greatest Army servicemen in British history.
Harry Flashman is well known in the British army, particularly by officers.
